blog.name: kateofthecanals
blog.title: "I'm honest. It's the world that's awful."
blog.description:
Musings from a writer/director that mostly have to do with ASOIAF/GoT. 
I am a proud (AND VOCAL) member of the SanSan Defense League. 
Kylo Ren is my precious trashbaby. 
My blog, my rules. 
Now let's play!

summary: Super interesting to me how much of an uptick there’s been lately of new SanSan shippers! I feel like everyday new fans are...
body:
Super interesting to me how much of an uptick there’s been lately of new SanSan shippers! I feel like everyday new fans are coming out of the woodwork, and I’m so curious to know why/how?? Is it because of the show? Is it because more people are starting to read the books and getting bitten by the SanSan bug? Or have they been lowkey shipping it for a while but only just recently worked up the nerve to come out as a SanSanobite??

If any newbies are reading this, please feel free to reply and tell me your story, I’m eager to know how you got here!!!

summary: everybody wants to talk about how misogynistic s8 was but nobody wants to talk about the fact that d&d had sansa compliment...
body: everybody wants to talk about how misogynistic s8 was but nobody wants to talk about the fact that d&d had sansa compliment tyrion and describe him as the best of her husbands even though he literally murdered the girl who was arguably sansa’s best and only friend during their entire marriage and never bothered to tell her

blog.name: silkygoldmilkweed
blog.title: sansa stark & sandor clegane are soulmates

tags: a song of ice and fire
summary: Duty is the death of love
body:
Duty is the death of love

1. Fuck you, George.

2. Fuck you double, D&D.

3. I wonder if the endgame of the book romance of D&D is “The Hound is not fit consort for a queen,” to paraphrase show!Tyrion about Daario, Jorah and to some extent himself. A relationship with someone like Hound—especially given his reputation as the butcher of Saltpans—would likely not tolerated by the men of the North that Sansa means to rule. Certainly in her youth it would put her in a deeply risky position and by the time she got old and her courtiers were willing to tolerate an edgier baby-daddy for the QITN, he would likely be dead one way or another.

4. This love story exists to torment me. Thank god for AO3.

summary: love comes softly
title: love comes softly
body:
“What are you doing?” 

Jaime froze, his hands on Honor’s saddle. The Stark girl’s voice is dripping with irritation and maybe even a hint of disappointment. He’s not completely sure with that, but he wouldn’t be surprised. Many people are disappointed with him. “It’s cold out here, my lady.” 

Sansa wrapped her coat more tightly around her, raising herself up to her full height. Her hair flames even in the low light and her blue eyes so like her mother’s flash. “Tell me right now, what are you doing?” She doesn’t give him a chance to speak, plowing on. “If you are going to join your sister, then I –” 

“No,” he spit angrily, turning on his heel to glare at the young woman. “No, of course not.” 

“Then what are you doing? Like you said, it’s too cold out for an evening horseback ride.” 

His gaze flickers to the ground. “I’m hoping to catch up with your sister.” 

Sansa blinked in surprise, her mouth going slack. “Are you insane?” 

“My lady -” 

“Ser Jaime, you rode all this way just to get away from Cersei, and now you want to give up the one good thing that you have to go and and try too -” 

“I’m the only one that can get through!” he snaps. “I’m the only one that can get through the city and back to her.” 

“You don’t know that!” Sansa retorted. “She sent someone to kill you and your brother!” Jaime sighed. Of course Tyrion opened his big mouth. When he glances back to Sansa, she’s peering at him like he’s something she found crawling by her foot. “Is this about Brienne?” 

“No.” 

“If you’re riding off to sacrifice yourself because you believe –” Her voice cut off and she gasped. “ - it is!” Jaime shushes her but she pays him no mind. “If you believe you are not good enough for her, don’t you think that is Brienne’s choice to make?” 

That gets him. He stares at her open mouthed for probably a good minute, and Sansa smiles at him triumphantly. “You are such a fool,” she tells him but her tone is softer, almost affectionate and his heart tears in his chest. She glances back at him with a bit of longing in her eyes and he suddenly feels like the fool she had just called him. “I don’t like you Ser Jaime. I don’t think I ever will. But I…trust you.” She laughs a little. “Gee I never thought I would say that but I guess it’s true. I trust Brienne, I trust her judgement and…I trust her love.” 

A soft sound that feels like a mix between a gasp and a sob breaks his mouth and he has to turn away, gripping the horn of Honor’s saddle like a vice. 

“I used to think love came like the songs, with the strong knights and the fair ladies,” Sansa’s eyes are not on him now, her gaze far off into a world that he cannot see. “But that’s not true is it?” She smiles. “Love just comes softly.” When her eyes return to his, he sees no judgement. “Go back to your chambers, Ser Jaime. I will see you in the morning.” 

She’s gone then, disappeared into the night like the wolf and he’s alone, wondering if she was ever there in the first place.

blog.name: junglekinzmewz
blog.title: Junglekinz Complains
blog.description:
Hello, my name is JunglekinzMEWZ or Danielle. I complain, so.... that's it.... sometimes I draw fanart. Though, I mostly just complain.
-Book reviews will be reposted to Jungle Reviews
OTHER TUMBLRS:
comics-destroy-me, angry-at-media, hay-pot

tags: help me choose i a character to draw
summary: I really wish Tumblr had a poll option
body:
I really wish Tumblr had a poll option

Okay! So, I need help on who to draw next of the GOT characters.

Characters I’ve Done:

  • Brienne of Tarth
  • Sansa Stark

Characters I haven’t done:

  • Literally all of them, you’ve got free reigns, my dudes.
  • I’m partial to Jaime or Cersei. (I like Jaime and not Larry, he’s not cool. I don’t like Cersei as a person, but she’d be a fun character to draw.)

Character Line-Up:

  • Daenerys Stormborn/Targaryen

They will all be drawn as various animals, so do tell me what animal you’d think they’d be if I haven’t drawn them yet! I am willing to do the same characters more than once if you have an interesting idea!!

(Message me, comment on this post, or do one of those weird asks they should be open.)

blog.name: loyalannister
blog.title: Everything ASoIaF
blog.description: An ASOIAF loyalist blog with special emphasis on the Starks; don't judge by the avatar

tags: d&d have no idea how to write female relationships
summary: The biggest crime Game of Thrones season 8 has committed is to pit two powerful female characters & their fans against each...
body: The biggest crime Game of Thrones season 8 has committed is to pit two powerful female characters & their fans against each other, two characters who both had to leave their homes, had to go through their fair share of trials & tribulations to survive, were constantly sidelined by men whom they were surrounded by and ultimately reached home only to be at each other’s throats regarding issues of food resources & regional independence when an apocalyptic existential threat was literally knocking at their doorstep

reblog.comment: The biggest crime Game of Thrones season 8 has committed is to pit two powerful female characters & their fans against each other, two characters who both had to leave their homes, had to go through their fair share of trials & tribulations to survive, were constantly sidelined by men whom they were surrounded by and ultimately reached home only to be at each other’s throats regarding issues of food resources & regional independence when an apocalyptic existential threat was literally knocking at their doorstep

tags: also how did they get so many kids who look that much alike
summary: Can we talk for a sec about how all the girls who play the Thénardier sisters in the new Les Mis adaptation make perfect...
body:
Can we talk for a sec about how all the girls who play the Thénardier sisters in the new Les Mis adaptation make perfect fancasts for Sansa and Arya? Like, look at Erin Kellyman and Alex Jarrett:

But like not just that, we also have them as babies growing up in Winterfell, in Sienna Barnes and Amani Johnson:

And we’ve got them at AGoT ages too (or maybe a touch younger) in Tiarna Williams and Isabelle Lewis:

Basically I’m just sad there isn’t more footage of the two of them together (or Azelma at all, frankly) because you can bet I’d be making tons of content with them.

summary: A dream of Winter and Summer
title: A dream of Winter and Summer
body:
https://archiveofourown.org/works/19118422/chapters/45431533

That’s it, folks! I have written a chapter! After 7 seven years XD

And yes, it’s probably rubbish, but hey, my writing skills are probably very rusty at this point XDXD

It starts as jonsa, but it will have more and more Sansa/Prince of Dorne, fair warning ;) (still pissed at Jon, I guess XDXD).

blog.description: I want very much for you to be happy, Sansa

summary: sick of everything, will you heal me?
title: sick of everything, will you heal me?
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2WeoNS4

by serenascampbell

Jaime is set to inherit the family business but Tywin demands he produce a successor before he’ll pass it over. A business deal puts Jaime at a dinner table with Brienne, the girl who’s despised him since the first time they met. Keeping up the pretence for a little while would be better for the both of them though.

Words: 5173, Chapters: 5/?, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Game of Thrones (TV), A Song of Ice and Fire - George R. R. Martin, A Song of Ice and Fire & Related Fandoms
  • Rating: Not Rated
  • Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings
  • Categories: F/F, F/M
  • Characters: Jaime Lannister, Brienne of Tarth, Tywin Lannister, Cersei Lannister, Tyrion Lannister, Selwyn Tarth, Sansa Stark, Mace Tyrell
  • Relationships: Jaime Lannister/Brienne of Tarth, Sansa Stark/Margaery Tyrell
  • Additional Tags: Alternate Universe - Modern Setting, Enemies to Friends to Lovers, Fake Dating, Braime - Freeform, background Sansaery


read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2WeoNS4

blog.name: bighound-littlebird
blog.title: The SanSan Safe Haven
blog.description: We strive to make this a quality Sansan blog free of hate for book and show fans alike. Our goal is to provide inspiration and quality sansan art, fanfiction recommendations , edits, meta, discussion, confessions, head canons and prompts for you.♡ We tag NSFW content. Header gif by @kingsleigh

summary: Hi! I love Sansan so so so much! The ship, the community, and especially the fanfics! My only problem is that I can’t read smut...
question: Hi! I love Sansan so so so much! The ship, the community, and especially the fanfics! My only problem is that I can’t read smut for very personal reasons and I always fall in love with fics before knowing that it’s going to be in there. Could you recommend some fics (angst and fluff) where there isn’t smut?
answer: Awesome, thanks for the love! Here’s a link to a list of sfw, smut free fics. I’m currently working on an updated list as well.

reblog.comment: Awesome, thanks for the love! Here’s a link to a list of sfw, smut free fics. I’m currently working on an updated list as well.

trail.content_raw: Awesome, thanks for the love! Here’s a link to a list of sfw, smut free fics. I’m currently working on an updated list as well.

blog.name: ladycibia
blog.title: Lady Cibia;
blog.description:
Un piccolo disagio umano. ( ´ ▽ ` )ﾉ
Silvia | Italy | May 4 | INFJ-T | Ravenclaw | Pokémon Trainer since 2000 | nostalgic a f*ck.
Just an ordinary idiot who enjoys drawing, puppies, muffins, cute things and horror/splatter movies. Yup.

summary: “When you play the game of pokémon, you win or you faint”- oh wait… it looked better on paper but that’s standard cibia failing...
caption:
“When you play the game of pokémon, you win or you faint”- oh wait…

it looked better on paper but that’s standard cibia failing at stuff for you I really shouldn’t indulge myself in drawing pokémon crossovers when a whole new generation is about to be released … *ahem* anyway. After making Lord Bae (x), I had to go with Sansa :) and even if she’s wearing her Alayne Stone disguise I still gave her her iconic red hair (and true name) because uuuuh, reasons, I guess? And anyway in my shameless pokémon au her team fully evolved (except for Ninetales, maybe- but still, it was Petyr who gave her a Vulpix :D) only during her time as Alayne Stone and why am I justifying a got/pokémon crossover jfldjl- as for her “trainer class”, I was tempted to put “Queen in the North” but…I really don’t want anything to do with season 7 and 8 (when possible, at least) :/ so ummm I hope you’ll like it? ;; Who’s next??

And anyway in my shameless pokémon au her team fully evolved (except for Ninetales, maybe- but still, it was Petyr who gave her a Vulpix :D) only during her time as Alayne Stone and why am I justifying a got/pokémon crossover jfldjl- as for her “trainer class”, I was tempted to put “Queen in the North” but…I really don’t want anything to do with season 7 and 8 (when possible, at least) :/ so ummm I hope you’ll like it? ;; Who’s next??

summary: Crying because the first word of the first Sansa’s chapter of the first book is her father’s name: “Eddard Stark had left before...
body:
Crying because the first word of the first Sansa’s chapter of the first book is her father’s name:

“Eddard Stark had left before dawn”

—A Game of Thrones - Sansa I

¡¡¡Eddard Stark

had left 

before dawn!!!

:sobbing forever:
